io.micronaut.configuration.acme.background

Class AcmeCertRefresherTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.configuration.acme.background.AcmeCertRefresherTask

  • @Singleton
public final class AcmeCertRefresherTask
extends java.lang.Object
    Background task to automatically refresh the certificates from an ACME server on a configurable interval.
